channel.title: Only 1 ip allowed to connect?
channel.description: ok how do i make it that only 1 ip is allowed from the same connection, so people didnt trade starter, and other random shit. please help me.

item.title: Only 1 ip allowed to connect?
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

Delta Scape Fix

well you could look for this

      case 128:
        // Trade Request
        int temp = inStream.readUnsignedWord();
        if (!antiHax())
          break;
        if (!inTrade) {
            trade_reqId = temp;
            tradeReq(trade_reqId);
        }

and modify to say

      case 128:
        // Trade Request
        int temp = inStream.readUnsignedWord();
        if (!antiHax())
          break;
        if (!inTrade) {
            trade_reqId = temp;
	int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(trade_reqId);
	client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
            if (c.playerLastConnect != playerLastConnect) 
            {
            tradeReq(trade_reqId);
            }
            if (c.playerLastConnect == playerLastConnect) 
            {
            sM("You can't trade that person");
            }
        }

Untested but im pritty sure it worksâ€¦

Delta Scape
